subject: Rugby (Game)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Mike Tolkin, who has spent the last 25 years as an English teacher, is leaving Xavier High School in Manhattan to take over as the new head coach of the United States rugby team.
snippet: Mike Tolkin, who has spent the last 25 years as an English teacher, is leaving Xavier High School in Manhattan to take over as the new head coach of the United States rugby team.
